title: 06/29/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/29/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises Paul George for his recent run in the playoffs and keeping the Clippers alive in the postseason after Kawhi Leonard's injury. He critiques Scottie Pippen for his comments about Phil Jackson and why he needs to properly frame his NBA career alongside Michael Jordan. He also ranks his top 10 sidekicks in the history of sports and you'll be shocked to find out where Pippen ends up. Plus, NBA All Star Cedric Ceballos joins the show to describe Pippen's career and if the Suns have what it takes to close out the Clippers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
